item.title: State of the App
item.description: Before I get into the technical details of the new apps I’m building, it would be helpful to describe the reference implementation, you know, for reference. The app, in a nutshell Go Recordkeeper is a relatively simple Single Page Application. You can: Log in + Sign up Create new records See/edit your old records Add/undo moves in a record Review the moves played in a record Download .sgf files containing records The intended user is of course me, but I wanted to add a proper auth flow and support multiple users so that anyone who wants to use it, can.
